Assumptions.Assumption: Policyholder data (policy number, contact, claim type) is accessible via secure APIs.
Claim system backend supports real-time APIs for status retrieval and claim initiation.
Required documents can be uploaded and stored securely via integrated DMS (Document Management System).
Conversational AI engine supports contextual handoff, entity recognition, and user intent classification.
OTP or authentication system is in place for policyholder identity verification.
Customer is already aware of digital channels like web or app as a point of interaction.

InScope.Scope: End-to-end conversational workflow for claim initiation including data capture, document upload, and validation.
Real-time claim status fetch using backend integration with categorization logic and guided next steps.
Context-aware AI agent built using LangGraph + Mistral, orchestrated through RAG pipeline.
Simple Bootstrap-based UI to demonstrate interaction with the AI agent.
Integration of OTP/policy check mechanism to validate customer identity.
Support for uploading basic formats (e.g., JPEG, PDF) for FNOL submission.
Logging of conversational transcripts for compliance and traceability.

OutOfScope.Rationale: Handled post-FNOL by claim processors; not part of conversational flow.
FNOL and status tracking do not involve financial disbursal orchestration.
The scope is limited to chat-based/textual interfaces.
Basic validations exist, but advanced fraud analytics is not in this phase.
UI mockups and interactions are for demo purposes only, not production-level apps.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Backend claim systems don�t expose real-time APIs
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Define fallback workflows (email triggers, escalation queues). Engage early with IT team.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: AI may misinterpret user intent or skip critical fields
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Use LangGraph for deterministic flow modeling; include fallbacks and user confirmation prompts.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Low customer trust in chatbot vs. human
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Highlight escalation to human agent; show transparency (e.g., �Bot is fetching info�).

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Data leakage due to improper access control
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Integrate strict access control, authentication layer, and data masking.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Document parsing failure or low quality uploads
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Provide retry prompts and real-time file format validations.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Adoption resistance from legacy claim teams
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Run co-piloted pilots; show time-savings & reduced manual effort in POC metrics.

RisksAndMitigations.RiskDescription: Peak loads or outages during disaster events
RisksAndMitigations.MitigationStrategy: Ensure autoscaling and fallback messaging during downtimes. Consider hybrid cloud deployment.
